Articles.Content: occasionally when reverting to VAB, my craft will be stuck in the floor, and I will be unable to retrieve it. Some parts can be pulled up, but the whole craft cannot be selected

Please, if you don't mind. Post in this topic I made. This is a huge issue and needs to be resolved asap. It's a game breaker bigger than any other ones I've seen.

Edited March 18, 2023 by B15hop

This is a major issue for me as well. Seems to happen most often with large/taller crafts. Still present after the first patch.

It's a real shame because I know a lot of people like me enjoy making stupidly big craft. It's part of the fun seeing something get to space that has no business being there lol.

Please fix this in the next patch.

 

Thanks,
